com.bigdata.journal

Class BasicSnapshotFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigdata.journal.BasicSnapshotFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISnapshotFactory

    public class BasicSnapshotFactory
extends Object
implements ISnapshotFactory
    Provides a basic implementation of a ISnapshotFactory to be used with non-HA operations to provide online backup capabilities. This is exposed via the REST API via the StatusServlet.
    Author:
    beebs

      • getSnapshotFile

        public File getSnapshotFile(IRootBlockView rbv)
                     throws IOException
        For the default implementation don't append the commit point to the file. In non-HA mode, the system does not have the responsibility to manage and restore from snapshots. That is accomplished by operations and procedures around the deployment of the non-HA service.
        Specified by:
        getSnapshotFile in interface ISnapshotFactory
        Parameters:
        rbv - The current root block. The snapshot will be consistent as of the commit point associated with this root block.
        Returns:
        The file on which the snapshot will be written. If the file exists, then it must be empty. If the file is in a directory, the directory must exist and must be writable.
        Throws:
        IOException
        See Also:
        CommitCounterUtility

      • getCompress

        public boolean getCompress()
        Description copied from interface: ISnapshotFactory
        When true the generated snapshot will be compressed.
        Specified by:
        getCompress in interface ISnapshotFactory
